result.title: BFS/DFS
result.content:
I guess, we will start with a week of BFS/DFS. I'm guessing that if you are here, then it is most likely you know these algorithms already. But there are still quite an amount of nontrivial problems that can be solved with only these algorithm.

If anyone have some good resource on problem in this area, please post. But problem should only require those concepts.
